summary: Musicfy allows you to create and discover AI covers of popular songs by artists such as Grimes, Travis Scott, Arianna Grande, Eminem, Jay-Z, and Drake & The Weekend.

Pico is an AI-powered text-to-app platform for entrepreneuers, consultants, and small business owners. It allows users to create microapps that showcase their knowledge or product features, have the potential to go viral with new audiences, or leverage ChatGPT to help be more productive. Examples include Subtle Art App, Paul Graham Advice App, and a Proofreading Tool. 4,000+ picos have been created so far.

AskCSV offers an AI-powered platform to simplify data analysis with CSV files, making it accessible to everyone. Our service is powered by cutting-edge technology and designed with rigorous safeguards to ensure your data privacy. With AskCSV, you can easily explore, analyze and visualize data with user-friendly tools, quickly gaining valuable insights and making simplified decisions.
simpler is an AI productivity app that helps you organize and prioritize tasks to focus on what matters. Try it for free or save big with a lifetime ownership with a 30-day money-back guarantee.

useCaseText: Creates charts from text inputs for visualization.
summary: A tool that converts text into beautiful charts, available on GitHub.
OnlyWaifus.ai offers unlimited usage of AI-generated waifus for a fee of $11 per month, with no hidden fees or contracts - cancel anytime.

useCaseText: Customized playlists based on musical preferences.
summary: Chat Jamshey, it's Jams. Ask me to create a personalized Spotify playlist for you.

Gems is an AI knowledge assistant that provides ready-to-use answers from all your knowledge, eliminating the need for manual organization. It searches all your knowledge to formulate a synthesized answer and provides sources with each answer so you can prove things any time. It's easy to set up and use, allowing you to access and share knowledge with ease.
Generate a personalized travel plan quickly and easily with AI. Sign up to be notified when the full version is available.

useCaseText: Intelligent language learning w/ personalized feedback.
summary: LearnLingo is a conversational AI that can be used to demonstrate its capabilities.
